item.title: Could red-light cameras be coming back to Phoenix? A Phoenix
item.description: Could red-light cameras be coming back to Phoenix? A Phoenix committee on traffic safety is considering bringing them back as a tool to make the cityâ€™s streets safer.

item.title: Ballet Arizona will offer free dance performances across the
item.description: Ballet Arizona will offer free dance performances across the Valley at local parks this September as part of their annual signature event called 'Ballet Under the Stars!' Here's where to go

item.title: From leading students to fellow teachers, Karen Hudson has d
item.description: From leading students to fellow teachers, Karen Hudson has done it all in the field of education. This year at Paradise Valley Union School District marks her 50th year as a teacher! She sat with ABC15's Elenee Dao and spoke about her teaching journey.
